concept.definition:
[PR] Fibroadenoma
[UMLS]
A fibroadenoma is a benign, or noncancerous, breast tumor. Unlike a breast cancer, which grows larger over time and can spread to other organs, a fibroadenoma remains in the breast tissue. Theyâ€™re pretty small, too. Most are only 1 or 2 centimeters in size.
Valid for the following modalities: MG US.

[PR] Fibroadenoma degeneration
Valid for the following modalities: MG.
